content:
ITransientErrorDetectionStrategy.IsTransient Method

Definition

Namespace:
Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.TransientFaultHandling
Assembly:
Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.TransientFaultHandling.dll

In this Article

Determines whether the specified exception represents a transient failure that can be compensated by a retry.

public bool IsTransient (Exception ex);
Parameters
ex
Exception

The exception object to be verified.

Returns
Boolean

true if the specified exception is considered as transient; otherwise, false.
